job.title: MSP Network Engineer
job.description: DescriptionltbrgtltpgtWe are hiring within our MSP Managed Services Provider Infrastructure team As a MSP Network Engineer you will be responsible for following established network designs configuring and deploying networking technologies addressing network support issues and performing network maintenance tasks for both Intermax Networks and our MSP clientele ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRoles and responsibilitiesltstronggt ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtInstall configure and maintain IT infrastructure for MSP clients including firewalls switches and wireless access points  ltligtltligtNetwork and Firewall administration supporting implementation of security policies and remediating conflicts ltligtltligtCoordination with system and application owners schedule and apply rule changes test and validate ltligtltligtEnsure system availability and reliability ltligtltligtProvide Level23 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues ltligtltligtWorking with thirdparty providers to keep the networks running efficiently ltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgtRequirementsltbrgtltulgtltligt2 years of experience in Routing and Network Engineering ltligtltligtKnowledge of infrastructure equipment and design to include firewalls switches Wireless Access Points and other networking technologies ltligtltligtAbility to work well both individually and in a team ltligtltligtProven handson experience ltligtltligtExcellent communication skills ltligtltligtWatchGuard andor Ubiquiti product line experience a plus ltligtltligtNetworking certifications such as WatchGuard Cisco Ubiquiti or CompTIA Network a plusltligtltulgt
